name: Flourish (DavidMagnussonUCSC)
description:
A game made for ARTG/CMPM 120 at UCSC by David Magnusson, Anthony Diaz, and Alain Kassarjian.

Special mention to:

Varick, for game conception and other contributions

Elizabeth and Nathan, our wonderful ARTG/CMPM 120 professors

And all the hardworking TAs of ARTG/CMPM 120.

Runs from localhost with python.
